siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Mental schedule prep
frontmatter.description: Set out with right outcomes in mind, recognize the unwavering progression of time.

frontmatter.title: Pathways to open options
frontmatter.description: Find pathways to increase options and grow opportunities. Choosing the _right projects_ is less important than finding something on the path.

frontmatter.title: Set the right targets
frontmatter.description: Hitting targets every time may be a sign of not setting big enough goals.  It's better to miss the right target than consistently hit easy targets.
